attributes.action: say "NO" to Parklands High School closure
attributes.additional_details: Parklands High School, Speke will be closing soon. If you dont agree with this decision then please sign this e-petition to say "NO to the closure Parkland  High School, Speke, Liverpool.  We need this School for the next generation of children of Speke. By signing this E-petition you are agreeing that the children of speke deserve to be educated within the locol community.
